name: Sub
description: Subiculum proper (outside of the hippocampus roll)

name: h-EC-med
description: EC on hippocampus slide, medial portion (closer to PrS); on more

name: h-EC-ctr
description: EC on hippocampus slide, halfway between medial and lateral extents

name: h-EC-lat
description: EC on hippocampus slide, lateral portion (closer to BA35)

name: h-BA35
description: BA35, lower half of the medial bank of CS

name: h-BA36
description: BA35, middle of the lateral bank of the CS

name: Amy
description: Amygdala (take five samples, center and sides)
